description:
HWAACHOO! Oh, it sure is wa...wa...warm today.
Huh?  What`s my "character", Micchan?
Eew, my nose won`t stop running...
I`m gonna drown in my own snot...
Oh no, I`m out of tissues!  They`ve abandonned me!  My fate is sealed...
Haa...HWACHOO!  Agh!  Now I`m glued to Yabecchi with my super-sticky snot!
I gotta do something!
Source: crunchyroll
